response.original_title: Тесак и все его убийства: показания, воспоминания, хроника
response.overview: Tesak died a year ago.  By this point, everyone had forgotten that he was the main neo-nazi of the 2000s.  They also forgot about the interviews in which he dreams of killing people and filming these murders in order to lead the country to revolution.  Taken out of context, these phrases from twenty years ago seem like posturing.  In this film, Tesak will tell for the first time the full story of the 11 murders he committed from 2002 to 2007.  Apparently, this should be considered his last interview.  All organizations mentioned in the film are prohibited.
response.title: Tesak and all his murders: testimony, memories, chronicle
